services: This is a service bot made by the Split Money App.
I can assist you with splitting expenses, tracking balances, and generating payment links.
For advanced queries, please visit our Help Center at https://split-money-app.netlify.app/help
Unfortunately, I cannot assist with technical issues or bugs. Please contact support@split-money-app.com.

faq.What is your return policy?: You can return items within 30 days of purchase.
faq.How do I place an order?: You can browse products on https://www.mystore.com and add them to your cart. Follow the checkout process to complete your purchase.
faq.How can I split expenses?: You can split expenses by creating a group, adding members, and entering shared expenses. The app will calculate balances automatically.
faq.Can I generate payment links?: Yes, you can generate payment links from the app. Go to the 'Payments' section, select the balance, and click 'Generate Payment Link.'
faq.What should I do if I find a bug?: Please report bugs via our support email at support@split-money-app.com.
faq.Is my data secure?: Yes, your data is encrypted and securely stored. We value your privacy.
faq.How do I add members to a group?: Go to the 'Groups' section, select the group, and click 'Add Members.' Enter their details to add them.
faq.Can I remove a group member?: Yes, group admins can remove members from the group settings page.
faq.How do I track balances?: The app automatically calculates balances and displays them in the 'Balances' tab.
faq.Is there a limit to the number of groups: No, you can create as many groups as you need.
faq.What payment methods are supported?: We support credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and PayPal.
faq.Can I set a custom currency?: Yes, go to the settings page to choose your preferred currency.
faq.How do I update my profile information?: Go to the 'Profile' section and edit your details.
faq.Can I recover a deleted group?: Unfortunately, deleted groups cannot be recovered.
faq.What is the Split Money App?: The Split Money App helps you manage shared expenses and track payments easily.
faq.Is the app free to use?: Yes, the basic features are free. However, premium features require a subscription.
faq.How do I subscribe to premium features?: Go to the 'Settings' tab, click 'Subscribe,' and follow the instructions.
faq.What happens if I forget my password?: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the steps to reset it.
faq.Can I export my expense data?: Yes, you can export data as a CSV file from the 'Reports' section.
faq.How do I delete my account?: Go to 'Settings,' select 'Delete Account,' and follow the instructions. Note that this action is irreversible.
faq.Can I split expenses unevenly?: Yes, the app allows you to customize individual contributions for shared expenses.
faq.How do I contact customer support?: You can email us at support@split-money-app.com.
faq.Does the app support recurring expenses?: Yes, you can set up recurring expenses in the 'Recurring Payments' section.
faq.How do I change my email address?: Go to 'Profile,' click 'Edit Email,' and enter your new email address.
faq.Can I use the app offline?: No, an internet connection is required to sync data.
faq.What happens if I lose my phone?: You can log in to your account from another device and access your data.
faq.Does the app support multiple currencies: Yes, you can select your preferred currency in the 'Settings' tab.
faq.How do I enable notifications?: Go to 'Settings' and enable notifications for activity updates.
faq.Can I invite friends to join the app?: Yes, use the 'Invite Friends' feature to send an invitation link.
faq.Is there a referral program?: Yes, refer friends and earn rewards when they sign up.
faq.What is the minimum age to use the app?: Users must be at least 18 years old to register.
faq.How do I change my password?: Go to 'Settings,' select 'Change Password,' and follow the instructions.
faq.What languages does the app support?: The app currently supports English, Spanish, French, and German.
faq.Is there a dark mode option?: Yes, you can enable dark mode in the 'Settings' tab.
faq.What should I do if the app crashes?: Try restarting the app. If the issue persists, contact support.
faq.Can I customize the app's theme?: No, theme customization is not available at the moment.
faq.How do I report inappropriate behavior?: Use the 'Report' option under the user's profile or email support.
faq.Can I schedule payments?: Yes, scheduled payments can be set in the 'Payments' tab.
faq.Does the app support biometric login?: Yes, you can enable fingerprint or face recognition in 'Settings.'
faq.How do I reset my app settings?: Go to 'Settings' and select 'Reset to Default.'
faq.What should I do if my payment fails?: Check your internet connection and payment method details. Contact support if the issue persists.
faq.Can I share expense reports with others?: Yes, you can share reports directly via email or messaging apps.
faq.Is there a desktop version of the app?: No, the app is currently available only on mobile devices.
faq.How do I archive a group?: Go to the group's settings and select 'Archive Group.'
faq.Can archived groups be restored?: Yes, archived groups can be restored from the 'Archived Groups' section.
